name: @pasu/cockpit-client
description: An API client for the headless CMS Cockpit

scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch && npm run sync-git-tag
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor && npm run sync-git-tag
scripts.bump:major: npm version major && npm run sync-git-tag
scripts.sync-git-tag: sh -c 'git tag v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d \"\")'

author: Pascal Stockert
